name: Threat Agent
body:
Open sourced repositories:

[threatagent/community](https://github.com/threatagent/community) - General resources we feel should be open sourced including the API docs, phishing templates, and a wiki of FAQs and helpful material.
[threatagent/threatagent](https://github.com/threatagent/threatagent) - Ruby gem to interface with the ThreatAgent API.
Community

The community repository currently includes phishing templates and API examples in a few different languages. In addition we have documented the JSON API inside of the repository. The wiki for the repository has pages for every open source tool we provide.

Threatagent

The threatagent gem is contains the source for the threatagent gem which gives access to the [ThreatAgent API](https://github.com/threatagent/community/api).

Authors and Contributors

@marcuscarey
@ipwnstuff
Support or Contact

Having trouble? Check out the wiki at https://github.com/threatagent/community/wiki or contact support@threatagent.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
